True Belief

I'm agnostic. This is important.

It's also important that you understand what that means. Look it up. Don't just assume you know.

If you're an atheist you need to rethink the logical conclusion of your beliefs.

If you believe in a loving, grandfather figure looking out for you then you probably should read the texts upon which you base your beliefs. I'm going to guess you haven't actually read them. But I'm sure you've perused a lot of things very unrelated to religion.

About

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built for Jekyll
  • Using a Hypde template but not fully Hyde
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Coded with Vim.
